author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Copper pipe capping tip…I deburr the inside and outside of the pipe, then use emery cloth. It’s important that any sharp burrs are removed. Then I mark the depth and slide on the SharkBite cap. This makes a watertight seal and allows me to get the water onto the house while I complete other work 🔥#sharkbite #plumbing #bathroomreno #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Copper Pipe Capping Tip - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
